actionTitle_allEngines_main.message: View page archive on all engines

actionTitle_engine_main.description: Title of the context menu item.

optionSectionDescription_engines.message: Toggle search engines and customize their order (drag and drop)

optionSectionTitle_misc.description: Title of the miscellaneous options section.

optionValue_showInContextMenu_link.message: Show in context menu for links

optionValue_showInContextMenu_false.message: Do not show in context menu

optionValue_searchAllEnginesContextMenu_.message: Search all engines from context menu
Search all engines from submenu of context menu
Do not search all engines from context menu

optionTitle_showPageAction.message: Show in address bar on server error

optionTitle_openNewTab.message: View page archive in a new tab

error_invalidUrl.message: The URL is not valid. It must point to a HTTP(S) or FTP page.

error_allEnginesDisabled.message: All search engines have been disabled. Visit the options page and enable at least one search engine.

error_internalError.message: Something went wrong. Try viewing the page archive or cache again.
